data.meta_description: Contact the staff at St. Peter Catholic Church at (337) 369-3816.
data.text:
Parish Office Closed Labor Day

The parish office will be closed on Monday, September 2, 2024, in observance of Labor Day. Normal office hours will resume at 8:00 am on Tuesday, September 3, 2024. Holy Mass will be offered at its regularly scheduled time on Monday, September 2, 2024

Sacramental Certificates for Genealogy Research

Birth, death and marriage certificates (dating back from 1838) are available from the parish office for genealogy purposes at a cost of $5.00 per certificate. These requests can be fulfilled in accordance with Diocesan guidelines. Requests should be made through the parish email (stpeter@cox-internet.com).

Please allow up to 2 weeks for mailing of these certificates.
